description: Detects net use command combo which executes files from WebDAV server; seen in malicious LNK files
name: Suspicious Net Use Command Combo
query: (process.executable.text:*\\cmd.exe* AND process.command_line.text:*\ net\ use\ http* AND process.command_line.text:*&\ start\ \/b\ * AND process.command_line.text:*\\DavWWWRoot\\* AND process.command_line.text:(*.exe\ * OR *.dll\ * OR *.bat\ * OR *.vbs\ * OR *.ps1\ *))
author: pH-T
